title: 12 "The Blood Rain of the One Hundred Foxes of Shinshu - Part II"(Japanese:「信州百狐血雨地獄」〜第三段〜) December 17, 1999(1999-12-17)
transformers_text: 12 The Blood Rain of the One Hundred Foxes of Shin shu Part II Japanese December 17 1999 1999 12 17 Sakon suspects foul play and finds blood spatters on hydrangea flowers in the nearby By akko Temple grounds Legend says that the Temple was built to venerate the spirits of 100 foxes whose blood the master sword smith Mura masa used during the quenching process to forge the By akko sword Sakon suggests that someone else killed So u ichiro u Akizuki and placed the blame on his son K you ichi
